jei.infested.jei_cobweb_trap_info: Can be placed to create a temporary cobweb that lasts for ten seconds. Entities wearing the Spider Boots are immune to its effect. Obtainable by shift right-clicking a block with an empty hand while wearing the full Spider Armor set.
advancements.infested_advancement.title: Infested!
gamerule.disableSilverfishTrap.descripti: If set to true, Silverfish Traps will be disabled.
enchantment.infested.ensnaring_strike.de: Consume durability to apply slowness to foes.
enchantment.infested.parasitoid.desc: Slain entities will spawn a silverfish to fight for you.
jei.infested.jei_raw_grub_info: Can be cooked into a nutritous meal, or fed raw to any arthropod tamed by you to restore a good amount of health.
jei.infested.jei_silverfish_eggs_info: Right click on a block with nothing above it to spawn two silverfish to fight for you for fifteen seconds.
jei.infested.jei_spider_armor_info: Armor made using a Spider Armor Trim. The Hood provides Night Vision, and the Chestpiece increases damage against entities trapped in cobwebs. While wearing the full set, you can shift right click on a block with an empty hand to obtain four Cobweb Traps, consuming some durability in the process. A cobweb trap will also spawn under you when you are attacked. The boots allow you to ignore the slowness from these traps.
jei.infested.jei_silverfish_trap_info: When activated via redstone, this block will disappear and spawn a swarm of Attack Silverfish, which will be hostile to anything they perceive as a threat, including you.
advancements.eat_grub_advancement.title: You WILL Eat The Bugs
jei.infested.jei_spinneret_info: When activated via redstone, this block will cover nearby ground with cobweb traps to slow entities.
jei.infested.jei_chitin_armor_info: Made using the Chitin Armor Trim. The Chestplate comes equipped with one level of the Infested enchantment, and wearing the full set provides a level of the Parasitoid enchantment. Additionally, while wearing the full set, you can occasionally crouch to enter an Ambush. This slows you down, but turns you invisible and deals bonus damage to the first entity you hit while the effect is active.
enchantment.infested.infested.desc: Spawn a silverfish to fight for you when you are hit with or block an attack.
jei.infested.jei_spider_egg_info: Dropped rarely by Cave Spiders. When used on a block, will spawn a friendly cave spider. If a potion is used on the spider, the effect it applies on hit will change. The color of its eyes can be changed with dye.
